required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Performance of Y-STRUT® Medical Device to Strengthen Pre-fractural Tumour-induced Lesions at the Level of the Proximal Femur
clinical_study.official_title: National, Multicentre, Prospective, Retrospective, Observational Study, to Evaluate the Performance of Y-STRUT® Medical Device to Strengthen Pre-fractural Tumour-induced Lesions at the Level of the Proximal Femur

brief_summary.textblock:
HIPPON 100 is a national, multicentre, prospective, retrospective, descriptive and non-interventional study, in patients having a Y-STRUT® medical device implanted to prevent a high risk of impending pathological fracture.
The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the performance of the studied medical device by measuring the frequency of patient with a fracture at the implantation site within 1 year after implantation.
A total of 100 patients from France will be enrolled (until November 2018) and followed up to 24 months.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of post-operative fracture [Performance of the device]
primary_outcome.description: Frequency of patient with a fracture at the implantation site

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of post-operative fracture [Performance of the device]
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of patient with a fracture at the implantation site

secondary_outcome.time_frame: immediate post-op, and at 6, 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Self-evaluation of pain using VAS (Visual Analogue Scale), going from 0 (no pain) to 10 (maximum).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resumption of weight-bearing [Tolerance of the device]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: immediate post-op, and at 6, 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of resumption of weight-bearing (yes/no at each visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life [Tolerance of the device]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-operative, immediate post-op, and at 6, 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of the quality of life using EORTC QLQ-C15-PAL questionnaire: the European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) has developed the QLQ-C15-PAL questionnaire (quality of life questionnaire with 15 items), a short version of the QLQ-C30 for palliative (PAL) care. Scale ranges go from 15 (better) to 63 points (worse) at the maximum.

secondary_outcome.measure: Recording of adverse events and device effects [Safety of the device]
secondary_outcome.description: Recording of the medical device vigilance: all serious adverse events, all adverse events linked to the device or the operative technique, and any other important event reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Surgical procedure duration [feasibility of the procedure]
Rates of complications [feasibility of the procedure]
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing types and frequencies of procedures complications.

secondary_outcome.measure: Calculation of associated costs [Economic impact of the procedure]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of the study (24 months from the last included patient)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of each cost associated with all the collected data linked to the procedure (implantation costs, hospitalisation costs, treatments for pain and other events). Then, the different costs are added together to determine the mean total cost of a procedure.

intervention.description: The studied medical device consists of two components implanted in the proximal femur, combined with bone cement.

study_pop.textblock: Patients treated with a Y-STRUT® device to strengthen pre-fractural tumour-induced lesions at the level of the proximal femur.
